name: emoji_stealer
short: Steal emojis from other servers by pasting them into chat.
description: Allows you to steal custom emojis from other servers by pasting an emoji like <:name:id>. Optionally rename it during upload.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
install_msg: Thanks for installing emoji_stealer! Use !steal <:emoji:ID> to import emojis from other servers.
author: Puppy
